problem_text_cn: 如图,长为10的线段AB的端点分别在x轴,y轴的正半轴上滑动(线段AB的长保持不变),⊙O与线段AB相切,则⊙O面积的最大值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the endpoints of the line segment AB with a length of N_0 slide on the positive semi-axes of the x-axis and y-axis respectively (the length of the line segment AB remains unchanged), ⊙O is tangent to the line segment AB, then the maximum area of ⊙O is ()
raw_answer: 解:过O作OC⊥AB于C,设A(a,0),B(0,b),∵⊙O与线段AB相切,∴OC=⊙O的半径r,∵S_{△AOB}=\frac{1}{2}OA\cdotOB=\frac{1}{2}AB\cdotOC,∴r=\frac{ab}{10},∵a^{2}+b^{2}-2ab≥0,∴ab≥q\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{2},∴当ab=\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{2}时,r=\frac{ab}{10}最大,即r_{最大}=\frac{\frac{a^{2}+b^{2}}{2}}{10}=5时,S最大=πr^{2}=25π,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质,坐标与图形的性质,圆的面积,最大值问题,解答本题的关键是利用a^{2}+b^{2}-2ab≥0,这一重要不等关系．
